Uses of Package
bermudanswaptionframework

  • Packages that use bermudanswaptionframework 
    Package Description
    bermudanswaptionframework
    Provides classes to specify Bermudan swaption products for dual valuation methods.
    lowerboundmethods
    Provides classes for lower bound valuation of Bermudan swaptions.
    simulationMethods
    Provides classes for upper bound valuation of Bermudan swaptions.
    tests  
    upperboundmethods
    Provides classes to execute simulations of Bermudan swaption valuation.
  • Classes in bermudanswaptionframework used by bermudanswaptionframework 
    Class and Description
    AbstractLIBORBermudanOption
    Provides a basic object for Bermudan interest rate options.
    BermudanSwaption
    Implements a Bermudan swaption product.
    BermudanSwaptionValueEstimatorInterface
    Interface to enable valuation using different methods through this interface.
    ExerciseStrategyInterface
    Interface to enable the use of several exercise strategies.
  • Classes in bermudanswaptionframework used by lowerboundmethods 
    Class and Description
    BermudanSwaption
    Implements a Bermudan swaption product.
    BermudanSwaptionValueEstimatorInterface
    Interface to enable valuation using different methods through this interface.
  • Classes in bermudanswaptionframework used by simulationMethods 
    Class and Description
    BermudanSwaption
    Implements a Bermudan swaption product.
    BermudanSwaptionValueEstimatorInterface
    Interface to enable valuation using different methods through this interface.
  • Classes in bermudanswaptionframework used by tests 
    Class and Description
    BermudanSwaptionValueEstimatorInterface
    Interface to enable valuation using different methods through this interface.
  • Classes in bermudanswaptionframework used by upperboundmethods 
    Class and Description
    BermudanSwaption
    Implements a Bermudan swaption product.
    BermudanSwaptionValueEstimatorInterface
    Interface to enable valuation using different methods through this interface.
    SimplestExerciseStrategy
    Implementing the basic exercise strategy: Exercise if the exercise value is bigger or equal the continuation value.
